control_attributes.Control: IA-2 (3) LOCAL ACCESS TO PRIVILEGED ACCOUNTS
control_attributes.control_description: The information system implements multifactor authentication for local access to privileged accounts.
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system accepts and electronically verifies Personal Identity Verification (PIV) credentials.
